name: WizardDodgeball
description:
WizardDodgeball is a projectile based, local multiplayer platform fighter. Pick between 4 unique elemental mages that all have their own movesets and playstyles! Simple, easy to pickup gameplay with large amounts of depth that allows you to showcase your skill!

Default Controls: 

Player 1 - WAD + numpad 123

Player 2 - IJL + left up right

You can change these in the settings!
